text:
@MarshaBlackburn Can we sue Trump for underfunding and understaffing at the CDC and NIH, for firing the pandemic team in the WH, for not using the pandemic playbook, ignoring the alerts by Intelligence in November for his malfeasance in handling this #coronavirus ?
Can WE?
